item.title: Meet the new senators being sworn in to Congress in 2025
item.description: The Senate is convening for the start of the 119th Congress on Friday, with a dozen new senators joining the upper chamber.

item.title: Search underway for Australian surfer likely killed in shark attack
item.description: Authorities say there's "been no sign of" a local surfer seen being attacked by a shark off South Australia's coast.
